features.1: Added an issue log to view/manage issues and linked it to AWS.
Rearranged previous/next buttons, and removed them if only one page is available.
features.2: Adjusted sizing of plots and labels to work with new layout.

features.1: Updated reader plots to be a 2x2 grid with 4 reader maximum

other.1: Refactored GUI to be more modular

features.1: Added a post-processing script to re-analyze data.
Now uploading summary csv instead of pdf
features.2: Experiment log is now uploaded in the experiment folder for the company.
features.3: Summary PDF now has experiment notes shown on the front page, rather than by the reader plots.
features.4: Summary PDF now places each readers plot on their own page.

bugfixes.1: App properly resets using new setup values. Introduced in v2.5.3
bugfixes.2: App properly handles equilibration time and SGI for multiple readers.
bugfixes.3: App properly handles the toggling between SGI and signal check.

other.1: Now properly parsing software update tags instead of relying on their order.
other.2: Inoculation was also updated to work with new experiment notes.
other.3: App properly handles software updates using new file structure.

features.1: Replaced `Cell Type` with `Experiment Id` on setup form

bugfixes.1: Fixed software updated bug introduces in v2.5.3

other.1: Updated guided setup to use an object rather than variables.

features.1: Reorganized file structure for data and backend files.
Updated signal check to use percentages instead of values.
features.2: Added an indicator to check the state of a reader (errored, working, scanning).

features.1: Updated default sweep frequency to 110-160 MHz
features.2: Closing guided setup now asks to close the app, rather than submitting the data.
features.3: Updated help dialog popup to only send the log to AWS, without placeholder text
features.4: Calibration now removes the first 0.2 MHz from the scan.

features.1: Added a button to download the analysis folder into a zip file.

bugfixes.1: Fixed bug causing end of experiment view to not show up.

features.1: Added a README.md file containing information about the files in the Analysis directory
features.2: Copied over second axis files into the Analysis directory.
features.3: Created instantaneous flip from SGI to signal check.

bugfixes.1: Gave the user the option of cancelling the port finding process to restart the app.
Ensured readers reconnect on the same port using their serial number.

features.1: Added support for setting equilibration period to 0.
features.2: Added back toggle to view signal check in ribbon.
features.3: Added Skroot copyright as app footer.
features.4: Added frequency and filename columns to smooth analyzed.
features.5: Created more specific error messages to display to user..

bugfixes.1: Fixed sorting of the release notes dialog to accurately represent versioning.
